TopicTitle: The Official Kerbin Cup Tournament Thread - Final Entries Posted

Articles.Content: Ohhhh, an interesting and topical final challenge. Should be fun to see what each team comes up with.
I'm not sure if I should feel happy or sad that I'm much more excited, hyped, and supportive of this team forum than the entire FIFA world cup
Huh, I assumed the challenge would be the same for both teams, this is more interesting but makes it harder to judge. Guess it's good we're just spectators this round.
don't worry, forum team has mechjeb
We now have our own Hype thread. It seems to be the thing to do.
But how will the voting work? The challenges are so different from eachother!

But how will the voting work? The challenges are so different from eachother!

I think you would just vote for the one you think is most impressive

a.k.a the forums

I think you would just vote for the one you think is most impressive

a.k.a the forums

Yeah, could be

And the a.k.a part is absolutely correct!

Edited July 24, 2014 by BadRocketsCo.
Looking forward to seeing the results for this challenge. Best of luck to both teams!
There won't be any voting from the community! (as far as I know)

Of course, best of luck to both.... But specifically for the forums...kick those redditer asses! I want to see an IPP so massive it would have made even Thomas Paine take a step back in awe. And the last Von Braun mission architecture to Mars? If you pull that off as it was intended (two ships flying in formation for backup, reuse of the departure stage, Mars propulsive capture into high orbit to save fuel etc...), you will be my personal heroes. It's one of my favourite mission proposals of all time!

And I'll throw in a suggestion: if you manage to need some of the backups and redundancies, the whole thing will be truly epic.

Rune. Ares XIII?

Edited July 25, 2014 by Rune

"... And do it all in a week. Good luck!"

I mean, come on, this sounds like something someone would post as a joke!

"... And do it all in a week. Good luck!"

I mean, come on, this sounds like something someone would post as a joke!

It is possible to do something like this in a week. A week of no work, no human interaction and little sleep.

Totally worth it!
And it's Monday! Will today be the day, the day that the forums triumph over the silly Reddit users, with their upvotes?

And it's Monday! Will today be the day, the day that the forums triumph over the silly Reddit users, with their upvotes?

Looks like we've got till Thursday morning
Can't wait!

Go modders. *Waves pompom.* (Or rather, doesn't...)

But I made one more Team Jedi poster,which cheers them on. Hopefully, there will be a forum victory!

Edited July 28, 2014 by Tw1

Can't wait!

Same here! Nice shuttle too Rune.
Go modders! Show Reddit what we're made of!
Go COM! Forums FTW! Forums FTW!

Go COM! Forums FTW! Forums FTW!

I agree with this chap's proposition.
For the first time ever, I'm rallying on the main forum's side, not Reddit. We have the majority of the good players on the forum, not on Reddit as is with other games.

So has anything been announced yet?

Also, FORUM! FORUM! FORUM!
Tomorrow, we will know. I think. The final stand, until the Olympics, or the next World Cup. Go COM, go Forum!
We haven't heard hardly anything from the modders, meaning they MUST be hard at work! Go forum!
